about_the_game:
Banish the Demon



As a renowned ghost hunter, you travel to abandoned places around the world and try to destroy the evil that has destroyed the lives of many people. Demons live in these forgotten places, dangerous to anyone who disturbs their presence.

Evil in these places draws its life energy from cursed objects that were used in an occult ritual to resurrect the demon. Your task will be to destroy these objects and weaken the demon enough to defeat him.

WARNING! Demons can appear at any time and try to take your life!
